interface.name: liri_shell
interface.description: This interface is bound by a special client called shell helper that is responsible for helping the compositor draw its user interface. It can only be bound once and only shell helper is allowed.

request.name: set_grab_surface
request.description: The surface set by this request will receive a fake pointer.enter event at position 0, 0 and is expected to set an appropriate cursor image every time the grab_cursor event is sent by the compositor.

event.name: grab_cursor

description.summary: tell client what cursor to show during a grab

event.description: This event will be sent immediately before a fake enter event on the grab surface.
